channel.title: Ip Ban
channel.description: You all must have noticed me need help lately, this is because i am working on my own server =-] i think it's coming along rather nice tbh :) and... i need to add the ip ban command, i added it but it came up with an error and woujld not work... please can someone help me? as i think i may have needed to add something else to it.

item.title: Ip Ban
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

search in client.java any “public void” … so search public void andunder that public void code put

[code]public void appendToBannedIP (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true)); //w/e your ip banned is
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning ip");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Ip Ban
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Add this with your public voids:

[code]public void appendToBannedIP (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/bannedips.txt", true)); //w/e your ip banned is
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error banning ip");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic

if(command.startsWith("ipban") && (playerRights >= 2)) { String victim = command.substring(6); PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim; int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim); if(otherPIndex != -1 && server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex] != null) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; appendToBannedIP(p.connectedFrom); } System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is IPbanning "+victim); sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully IPbanned"); }

Add that under

[code]public void customCommand(String command) {
actionAmount++;

command.replaceAll(“no-ip”, “w00tsc4p3.no-ip.org”);
command.replaceAll(“servegame”, “w00tsc4p3.servegame.com”);
command.trim();[/code]
